name: Anonymization
descr: Anonymization allows to modify segments of an annotation, of an audio file and/or of a video file in order to make their content un-understandable and un-identifiable. Requires a tier with intervals.

options.text: Pattern of the annotated file with the intervals to be buzzed
Name of the tier with intervals to be anonymized
Pattern to append to the name of the anonymized tier
Pattern to find intervals to be anonymized
Rule to be applied to select intervals: equal, contains, ...
Anonymization of the video file: none, face or mouth
